articles.author: Margaret Rhodes
articles.title: The coronavirus problem could be solved by design thinking
articles.description: Data visualization, better infrastructure, and a reimagined health care system could change the course of the outbreak.

articles.author: Defne Gencler
articles.title: Americans Should Avoid Travel to China During Outbreak, CDC Says
articles.description: Travelers have been advised to avoid China as the coronavirus has claimed more than 100 lives.

articles.author: David Meyer
articles.title: Companies respond to the coronavirus outbreak
articles.description: The intensifying spread of the virus is roiling markets and leading companies to suspend employee travel.

articles.author: Ian Mount
articles.title: Hong Kong clamps down on travelers from China as coronavirus infections spike
articles.description: The latest moves are aimed at protecting an Asian financial hub that has already been reeling from months of anti-Beijing protests.

articles.author: Karen Yuan
articles.title: Big Tech vs. coronavirus: can Apple, Amazon and Microsoft restore calm to the global markets?
articles.description: Apple and Ebay are the first up to report earnings today.
